page.title: 03CLUBS
page.content: {...Group Activities.. {Norton Lindsey & Wolverton Cricket {Club.Founded 1886.It owns a club house {& plays on Norton Lindsey village {field.2 teams play about 90 matches a {year.Darts team,pool team,social club. {The members are local people,people {with connections in the village & some {outsiders.Membership fee Â£8.50 per.yr. Norton Lindsey Playschool.The children arrive at 9.30.The playschool has been running since 30.1.84.There are about twelve children in the group at present.They come from Claverdon, Snitterfield & Norton Lindsey with ages from 2.75 to 5 yrs. {The Brownies.They use the village hall {for thier weekly meetings and are {supported by all the local girls of {the correct age. {The Stilton Sniffers are the male club {who organise events for charity .
